---
title: Getting Started with SPFx Toolkit
description: Download, install, and get started with SPFx Toolkit for SharePoint Framework development.
---

## 🎁 Download & Installation

👉 You may download the [VS Code extension directly from the marketplace](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=m365pnp.viva-connections-toolkit)


## 📦 Bundle

The extension comes as a bundle together with two other VS Code extensions:

- **[CodeTour](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=vsls-contrib.codetour)** by [Jonathan Carter](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/publishers/vsls-contrib)
- **[SPFx Snippets](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=eliostruyf.spfx-snippets)** by [Elio Struyf](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/publishers/eliostruyf)

![Bundled Extensions](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/58668583/266729068-dd7da344-8399-489c-9df6-24e5f9bd852b.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..tDEqzvnIUCrIG8HsnFqo9HDAaMI3uhWMBDV81Ul1IGA)


## 🧪 Pre-release

After you install the extension you will get the latest major version but it is possible to switch to the pre-release version of the tool using the "Switch to Pre-Release Version" in order to try out the beta features and work with the latest and greatest 🤩

> 💬 Please be sure to provide feedback opening a [discussion](https://github.com/pnp/vscode-viva/discussions).

## 🐞 Found a Bug?

If you noticed a bug please do not hesitate to open an [issue](https://github.com/pnp/vscode-viva/issues/new/choose) and let us know so we may fix it ASAP 👍
